Directions: Place water and butter in a large saucepan; stir in rice, contents of rice seasoning packet and curry powder. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add shrimp and bacon. Cover and simmer 10 minutes longer or until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender.
Ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package long grain and wild rice mix
1 (6 ounce) can small shrimp, rinsed and drained
